item.title: Replace a bad hard drive on a Synology DiskStation RAID 5 with DSM 5.0
item.description: I received an alert from my Synology RAID regarding a few bad sectors on a hard drive. Even though the RAID is still operational, it’s best practice to replace the hard drive before any data gets corrupted due to the bad sectors.
